metadata.title: CVE-2017-0547 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An information disclosure vulnerability in libmedia in Mediaserver couldenable a local malicious application to access data outside of itspermission levels. This issue is rated as High because it is a generalbypass for operating system protections that isolate application data fromother applications. Product: Android. Versions: 4.4.4, 5.0.2, 5.1.1, 6.0,6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1. Android ID: A-33861560.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
